imdb.plot outline: GATN is a tale of a man and his roommate. A man who has hit absolute rock bottom - and can't stop digging deeper. A roommate who happens to be a ninja. Geoff's life changes forever as Ninja pulls him into impossible adventures while helping him get back on his feet. Will pirate kings, wizards, and time-space conundrums prove to be Geoff's end? Or will he learn valuable lessons about himself he never thought possible?? You probably already know the answer, but admit it - you really want to see it happen with an all-powerful ninja. We sure do.
imdb.title: Geoff and the Ninja
